name: MyFiretruckbydoqxD
0:
”Alexa, use my Firetruck and Start the Engine”
”Alexa, use my Firetruck and Turn on the Siren”
”Alexa, use my Firetruck and Call Dispatch”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my firetruck
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With the My Firetruck skill, you can hear your Firetruck come to life by starting your engine, using your siren, or calling into dispatch. 

HOW DOES IT WORK?
After enabling this skill, talk to your Firetruck by saying:

"Alexa, use my Firetruck". 

Then, you can say...

- Alexa, turn on Siren
- Alexa, listen to Dispatch
- Alexa, open Equipment Drawer
- Alexa, start the Engine
- Alexa, call Dispatch
- Try using "Repeat", "Stop", "Resume", or commands like "Loop" to add custom control to your Firetruck's sound effects when a sound effect is playing

Tip: You can also speak directly to Alexa if you know which commands you'd like to give.
Ex: "Alexa, use my Firetruck and turn on Siren" will activate your Firetruck and play your Firetruck's sirens. 

We're constantly working on new updates to your Firetruck, and will be releasing additional sound effects in the future to. Check out our What's New section for the latest updates.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
